description: Improved version of a Rectifier prototype from the Huanglong next-gen mass production weaponry project. With surging power and highly purified lens, its sound is only played by the wise of steel-like will.
ranks: When Resonance Skill is released, if Resonator's HP is below 60%, restores their HP by 5%. This effect an be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s; if Resonator's HP is above 60%, increases ATK by 12%, lasting for 10s.Materials Needed

When Resonance Skill is released, if Resonator's HP is below 60%, restores their HP by 6.25%. This effect an be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s; if Resonator's HP is above 60%, increases ATK by 15%, lasting for 10s.Materials Needed

When Resonance Skill is released, if Resonator's HP is below 60%, restores their HP by 7.5%. This effect an be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s; if Resonator's HP is above 60%, increases ATK by 18%, lasting for 10s.Materials Needed

When Resonance Skill is released, if Resonator's HP is below 60%, restores their HP by 8.75%. This effect an be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s; if Resonator's HP is above 60%, increases ATK by 21%, lasting for 10s.Materials Needed

When Resonance Skill is released, if Resonator's HP is below 60%, restores their HP by 10%. This effect an be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s; if Resonator's HP is above 60%, increases ATK by 24%, lasting for 10s.Materials Needed
